RainbruRPG::Gui::ClientList

RainbruRPG::Gui::ClientList Class Reference

#include <clientlist.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Show a table with connected/refused clients information.

The table is feed with unique clients information : IP adress, port and client type. The result of the connection (accepted or refused) is shown. The last column indicates the number of connection the client ask.

This list is feed by MainServerWindow when a client is request a connection.

It uses a npIdentification instance to convert tNetworkClientType to an human-readable string.
